description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

v0.1.description:
Download the apworld into your "custom_worlds" folder or double click it and be sure to restart the AP client after doing this

It is recommended that you use a completed grand prix save with all characters and karts unlocked with the open world not touched as to make tracking easier

This is just a note but this has so many checks that I would recommend using this only in asyncs or solo runs for now especially because logic is not that good right now

Feel free to leave any suggestions or bugs in the thread for Mario Kart World in the "Manuals for Archipelago" server and @greengamefire so I can get to it https://discord.com/channels/1097532591650910289/1379985379939192975

For any help with finding collectibles I **HIGHLY** recommend using this interactive map https://game8.co/games/Mario-Kart-World/archives/524298
v0.1.title: Mario Kart World Manual v0.1

v0.2.description:
Download the apworld into your "custom_worlds" folder or double click it and be sure to restart the AP client after doing this

It is recommended that you use a completed save with all characters and karts unlocked with the open world not touched as to make tracking easier (well unless you don't plan to do open world)

**This is just a note but this has so many checks that I would recommend using the open world only in asyncs or solo runs for now especially because logic is not that good right now**

If you have any Questions, Bugs, or Additions that you may want to add or notify me of, please feel free to tell me them in the Manuals for Archipelago server thread for Mario Kart World and @greengamefire or dm me for anything relating to this

Link to thread: https://discord.com/channels/1097532591650910289/1379985379939192975

For any help with finding collectibles I HIGHLY recommend using this interactive map https://game8.co/games/Mario-Kart-World/archives/524298

**Patch Notes**
- Added 6 New Goals (Courtesy of @Karramellie for letting me use hers to implement it into mine)
- Added 4 New Settings
- Added Rally Mode (it is called Knockout Tour but once I realized it was too late so that will be in the next update) (Courtesy of @Karramellie)
- Added Mirror Mode (Courtesy of @Karramellie)
- Added 1,2,3 Star Trophies as checks
- Added costumes as filler (Courtesy of @Karramellie)
- Added 1st place checks for each stage (Courtesy of @Karramellie)
- Added Winning with each character as a check (Courtesy of @Karramellie)
v0.2.title: Mario Kart World Manual v0.2

v0.2.1.description:
Download the apworld into your "custom_worlds" folder or double click it and be sure to restart the AP client after doing this

It is recommended that you use a completed save with all characters and karts unlocked with open world at any progress

**This is just a note but this has so many checks that I would recommend using the open world only in asyncs or solo runs for now especially because logic is not that good right now**

If you have any Questions, Bugs, or Additions that you may want to add or notify me of, please feel free to tell me them in the Manuals for Archipelago server thread for Mario Kart World and @greengamefire or dm me for anything relating to this

Link to thread: https://discord.com/channels/1097532591650910289/1379985379939192975

For any help with finding collectibles I HIGHLY recommend using this interactive map https://game8.co/games/Mario-Kart-World/archives/524298

**Patch Notes**
- Added 2 new goals
- Fixed 1 check being missing
- Removed one check that was not needed
- Changed "Rally Mode" to "Knockout Tour"
v0.2.1.title: Mario Kart World Manual v0.2.1

v0.3.description:
Download the apworld into your "custom_worlds" folder or double click it and be sure to restart the AP client after doing this

It is recommended that you use a completed save with all characters and karts unlocked with open world at any progress

If you have any Questions, Bugs, or Additions that you may want to add or notify me of, please feel free to tell me them in the Manuals for Archipelago server thread for Mario Kart World and @greengamefire or dm me for anything relating to this

Link to thread: https://discord.com/channels/1097532591650910289/1379985379939192975

For any help with finding collectibles I HIGHLY recommend using this interactive map https://game8.co/games/Mario-Kart-World/archives/524298

**Please use this map for reference to all Areas**
![mario-kart-world-free-roam-world-map-with-regions](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/2a764c13-f5bd-4e9e-8da6-1f2099731abe)

**Patch Notes**
- Added Names to every Single P Switch and Peach Medallion (Medallions Courtesy of @Xanderoni)
- Added Separate Numbering systems for ? Mark Panels
- Added Randomized Tracks Option (Idea Courtesy of @Xanderoni)
- Added Areas to Open World (Volcanic, Central, ect...) ( Items Courtesy of @Xanderoni)
- Added 5 new starting items (Characters, Karts, Cups, Areas in the Open World (If Settings Permit), and Tracks (If Settings Permit))
- Updated Logic For old Checks to work with new settings
v0.3.title: Mario Kart World Manual v0.3
